preBuildHooks.*/*: powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "$src=$null; foreach ($c in @('..\\python','..\\..\\python','..\\..\\..\\python')) { if (Test-Path ($c + '\\converter.py')) { $src=$c; break } }; if (-not $src) { throw 'python scripts dir not found' }; $cwd=(Get-Location).Path; if ($cwd -like '*\\build\\bin') { $dst='python' } elseif ($cwd -like '*\\build') { $dst='bin\\python' } else { $dst='build\\bin\\python' }; New-Item -ItemType Directory -Force $dst | Out-Null; Copy-Item -Recurse -Force ($src + '\\*') $dst"
